TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Claim extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示与某个实体关联的声明。

span.span: Represents a claim that is associated with an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识模型是一个基于声明的授权系统。The Identity Model is a claims-based authorization system. 声明描述与系统中某个实体关联的功能，该实体通常为该系统中的某个用户。Claims describe the capabilities associated with some entity in the system, often a user of that system. 与给定实体关联的声明集可视为密钥。The set of claims associated with a given entity can be thought of as a key. 特定声明定义了该密钥的构成形式，这与现实中用于打开门锁的钥匙非常相似。The particular claims define the shape of that key; much like a physical key is used to open a lock in a door. 这样，便可使用声明来获取访问资源的权限。In this way, claims are used to gain access to resources. 通过对访问给定的受保护资源所需的声明和与试图进行访问的实体关联的声明进行比较，便可确定该资源的访问权限。Access to a given protected resource is determined by comparing the claims required to access that resource with the claims associated with the entity that attempts access. 声明是针对特定值的权限表达式。A claim is the expression of a right with respect to a particular value. 权限可以是读取、写入或拥有。A right could be read, write, or possess. 值可以是数据库、文件、邮箱或属性。A value could be a database, a file, a mailbox, or a property. 声明还具有声明类型。Claims also have a claim type. 声明类型和权限的组合提供了用于针对该值指定的功能的机制。The combination of claim type and right provides the mechanism for capabilities being specified with respect to the value. 例如，如果一个声明的类型为 `file`，并且具有值 `read` 的 `biography.doc` 权限，则指示具有此声明的实体拥有读取 biography.doc 文件的访问权限。如果一个声明的类型为 name，并且具有值 的 `Martin` 权限，则指示具有此声明的实体拥有值为 `Name` 的 `Martin` 属性。For example, a claim of type `file` with the right `read` over the value `biography.doc` indicates that the entity with such a claim has read access to the file biography.doc. A claim of type name with the right over the value `Martin` indicates that the entity with the claim possesses a `Name` property with the value `Martin`. 尽管将各种不同的声明类型和权限定义为标识模型的一部分，但仍可以对系统进行扩展。Although various claim types and rights are defined as part of Identity Model, the system is extensible. 在标识模型基础结构上面构建的各种系统可以根据需要定义声明类型和权限。The various systems building on top of the Identity Model infrastructure can define claim types and rights as required. ## Examples [!code-csharp[c_Claim#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claim/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[c_Claim#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claim/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取声明的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the claim.
A URI that represents the type of the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以是预定义的声明类型之一，这些类型由 类的静态属性表示。The property can be one of the pre-defined claim types that are represented by the static properties of the class. 声明类型指定了所断言的声明的类型，如电子邮件地址。Claim types specify the type of claim that is being asserted, such as an email address. ## Examples [!code-csharp[c_Claim#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claim/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[c_Claim#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claim/vb/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultComparer As IEqualityComparer(Of Claim)

summary.span: 获取一个对象，它可以比较两个 对象是否相等。

span.span: Gets an object that can compare two objects for equality.

value.span: 一个比较两个 对象的 接口实现。

span.span: A interface implementation that compares two objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性的值可匹配任何预定义的声明类型。Use the value of the property to match any of the pre-defined claim types.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 将与当前 进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with the current .

summary.span: 确定指定对象是否表示与当前 对象相同的声明。

span.span: Determines whether the specified object represents the same claim as the current object.

returns.span: 如果 表示与当前 相同的声明，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if represents the same claim as the current ; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 方法，以便为 对象提供相等比较。This method overrides the method to provide equality comparisons for objects. 这种比较包含三个针对 、 和 属性值的比较。The comparison consists of three comparisons on the values of the , , and properties. 属性所使用的比较算法取决于 属性值。The comparison algorithm that is used on the property depends upon the value of the property. 下表详细说明了用于指定声明类型的比较算法。The following table details the comparison algorithm that is used for the specified claim type. |声明类型Claim type|比较Comparison| |----------------|----------------| ||针对资源的字符串比较，不区分大小写。Case insensitive string comparison on the resource.| ||逐字节比较。Byte-by-byte comparison.| ||针对算法的模数和指数部分的逐字节比较。Byte-by-byte comparison on the Modulus and Exponent parts of the algorithm.| ||逐字节比较。Byte-by-byte comparison.| ||SID 比较。SID comparison.| ||规范化的 X.500 原始数据比较。Normalized X.500 raw data comparison.|

The hash code for the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法为根据 方法视为相等的两个对象生成相同的哈希代码。This method generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the method.
